description: An issue was discovered on Moxa MGate MB3170 and MB3270 devices before 4.1, MB3280 and MB3480 devices before 3.1, MB3660 devices before 2.3, and MB3180 devices before 2.1. A Buffer overflow in the built-in web server allows remote attackers to initiate DoS, and probably to execute arbitrary code (issue 1 of 2).
